fr.sorbonne_u.components.plugins.asynccall.example

Class Server.Show

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.plugins.asynccall.AbstractAsyncCall
      • fr.sorbonne_u.components.plugins.asynccall.example.Server.Show
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AsyncCallI, java.io.Serializable
    Enclosing class:
    Server

    public static class Server.Show
extends AbstractAsyncCall
    The class Show implements a command in a Command pattern to allow calling the service show asynchronously with a termination signal sent back using another asynchronous call.

    Description

    White-box Invariant

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Black-box Invariant

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Created on : 2021-04-21

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
